## Description
Briefly explain the issue (wrong info, broken link, formatting problem).

## File / Section
Link to the file/section where the bug appears.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to …
2. Click on …
3. See error

## Expected
What should it say/show?

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots.

## Additional context
Any references or notes.
